name: unworried
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
not thinking about problems or unpleasant things that might happen: Despite her concerns, she tried to appear unworried when she met her friends. He explained everything to me in a calm and unworried tone. Opposite
worried
More examplesFewer examplesThe government seems to be unworried about the latest unemployment statistics.Investors in the company seem unworried about the increased price of raw materials.Many people are quite unworried about the plan to introduce identity cards.The traditional parties claim to be unworried about the rising popularity of the Greens.
